fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Dragon's Bane__
The highest Elemental Mastery main stat available on a polearm makes this the best option for Raiden as a Hyperbloom unit.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Moonpiercer, Kitain Cross-Spear__
Alternative forge options if you don't have Dragon's Bane. They offer Elemental Mastery but it's a little under half of Dragon's Bane. Granted the effect of Moonpiercer is potentially useful.
